连接桌面和网络软件，构建全/半自动工作流: Connect desktop and web apps together to build a workflow
对接海量AI服务，快速提升工作效率: Seamlessly integrate with cloud services to improve work efficiency
用JSON定义工作流图形界面: Build an GUI workflow assistant with a few lines of JSON code
一款基于AI的工作流自动化框架。: A desktop plugin system that brings AI to your workflow.
一键抠图，GPT生成文字，Stable Diffusion模型生成图片，文字语音: One-click image segmentation, text generation using GPT, image generation using stable diffusion models.
小程序开发者工具是支付宝开放平台打造的一站式小程序研发工具，提供了编码、调试、测: Alipay Mini Program Studio is an open platform tool for developing small programs. It provides coding, debugging, testing, uploading, project management, etc.
